template.description: Learn how to use MiNiFi to tail log files, deliver to NiFi, and save to HDFS.
template.name: MiNiFi Tail Logs to NiFi to HDFS Demo

labels.label: This input port must be on main root canvas.
This flow is used to create the MiNiFi Template
This is used to organize per hostname.

Instructions:
1. Make sure MiNiFi installed on data source and able to communicate with this NiFi node 2. Edit Demo Variables - hadoopConfigurationResources 3. Start NiFi Input Port 4. Edit Remote Process Group in MiNiFi Flow 5. Create MiNiFi Flow Template in Nifi 6. Import Template to MiNiFi 7. Start MiNifi 8. Monitor Flow and HDFS Endpoint

outputPorts.name: Output
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'Output'' is invalid because Output connection for port 'Output' is not defined.

labels.label: Set this to the NiFi url running the input port. This should be the same NiFi instance that holds this current process group.

processGroups.name: Minifi Flow - Tail Messages, Secure, Yum
